metadata.llmContext:
# DUPESH NAYAK - AI/ML Engineer Portfolio Context

## CONTACT
Name: Dupesh Nayak
Role: AI/ML Engineer
Email: nayakdupesh@outlook.com
Phone: +91 8292927094
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/dupeshnayak
GitHub: github.com/TirexRover
Location: Bengaluru

## SUMMARY
Recent B.Tech graduate in Electronics and Communication with a minor in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision from Manipal Institute of Technology. Specialized in building intelligent AI systems with focus on LLMs, RAG implementations, and data analytics. Strong foundational skills in Python, Machine Learning, and process automation. Experience spans 2022-2025 across projects, internships, and industry training.

## CURRENT POSITION
AI/ML Engineer at Accure AI (2025-Present)

## TECHNICAL SKILLS

### Core Programming
- Languages: Python, HTML, CSS, LaTeX
- Frameworks: Streamlit, Node.js
- Hardware: Arduino

### AI/ML Technologies
- ML Frameworks: PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face
- LLM Tools: LangChain, CrewAI, LlamaIndex, Ollama
- Techniques: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), NLP, Fine-tuning LLMs, Agentic AI
- Specializations: GenAI, ML Development, LLM-Ops

### Data & Analytics
- Databases: SQL, Redis
- Visualization: Tableau, Power BI, Dash, Plotly, Excel
- Analysis: Data Analytics, Data Warehousing, Predictive Modeling

### Infrastructure & DevOps
- Cloud: AWS, Azure, GCP
- Automation: n8n, CI/CD pipelines
- Acceleration: CUDA

### Certifications
- GenAI, Machine learning, Data Engineering Certification bu Accure.us
 Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
- Python Fundamentals
- C# Programming Basics

## KEY PROJECTS

### 1. Improving Fine-tuned Model using RAG (Oct 2024 - Feb 2025)
**Objective:** Enhance fine-tuned AI model accuracy for technical queries
**Achievement:** Improved response accuracy by 20%
**Technical Implementation:**
- Implemented Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture
- Integrated multiple knowledge bases for contextual LLM responses
- Developed vector database knowledge base with retrieval system
- Utilized text embeddings and chunking techniques for optimal retrieval
**Impact:** +20% accuracy improvement

### 2. Customer Survival Analysis (Mar 2023 - Jun 2023)
**Objective:** Predict customer lifetime value and churn
**Technical Implementation:**
- Built Random Forest deep learning model
- Applied weighted modeling to mitigate class imbalance
- Performed predictive analysis using data analytics practices
**Achievement:** 0.85 ROC-AUC score

### 3. E-Commerce Automation Testing (Oct 2022 - Feb 2023)
**Scope:** Automated testing for core e-commerce functionalities
**Technical Implementation:**
- Designed test cases for shopping cart, payment gateway, checkout processes
- Implemented Selenium-based automation framework
- Used AI agents to accelerate test generation
- SQL-based validation for database integrity during integration testing
- HTML/CSS for functional testing
**Achievement:** 20% reduction in testing time

### 4. Data Visualization Dashboard (Sep 2022 - Oct 2022)
**Technical Stack:** Python, Plotly, Dash, Pandas
**Features:** Interactive dashboards for statistical data exploration
**Capacity:** Handled datasets up to 10 MB
**Outcome:** Enabled intricate pattern discovery through multi-chart visualization

## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

### Industry Training | Vivartan Technologies, Bengaluru (Jun 2023 - Sep 2024)
**Focus:** Embedded Systems, IoT, and AI
**Work:**
- Device programming and cloud integration
- Completed 5 major projects solving real-world problems
- Hands-on implementation of embedded systems and AI solutions

### Co-Founder | CyberSpace Cybersecurity Club (Jun 2023 - Sep 2024)
**Leadership:**
- Led industry workshops for 1,000+ participants
- Topics: Security basics, white-hat hacking
- Developed team collaboration and leadership skills
- Event organization and stakeholder management

### Technical Intern | BSNL India (Jun 2023 - Jul 2023)
**Contributions:**
- Collaborated with engineering and compliance teams
- Implemented process improvements
- Automated network diagnostics using scripting
**Achievement:** Reduced troubleshooting time by 30%
**Skills:** Workflow optimization, feature prioritization

## EDUCATION

### Manipal Institute of Technology, Bengaluru (Oct 2021 - Aug 2025)
- Degree: B.Tech in Electronics and Communication
- Minor: Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision
- CGPA: 68%

### Holy Cross School, Chinmaya, Bokaro (Jun 2017 - Jul 2021)
- Stream: CBSE Science (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Computer Science)
- Score: 86.5%

## ACHIEVEMENTS & ACTIVITIES

### Volunteer Work
- Contributor to Do Help Foundation
- Volunteer Service Organization (VSO) - assisting BPL individuals

### Extracurricular
- Lead vocalist for MIT band
- Winner of high school volleyball tournament
- Winner of music competitions

### Soft Skills
- Problem-solving
- Critical Thinking
- Time Management
- Strategic Planning
- Stakeholder Communication
- Client Presentations
- Workshop Facilitation
- Cross-functional Collaboration

---

## CONTEXT USAGE GUIDELINES
1. All quantitative achievements are verified and should be cited exactly (20% accuracy improvement, 0.85 ROC-AUC, 30% time reduction, 1,000+ workshop participants)
2. Do not infer qualifications, experience, or technical details beyond what is explicitly stated
3. Experience timeline: 2022-2025 (projects and internships), currently employed at Accure AI since 2025
4. Primary expertise areas: LLMs, RAG, Agentic AI, Data Analytics, Process Automation, ML Development
5. This context represents the complete, authoritative knowledge base for Dupesh Nayak's portfolio 
5

prompts: Tell me about your RAG project

messages.content: I'm Dupesh Nayak, a Data Analyst & AI Engineer with a B.Tech in Electronics & Communication and a minor in AI from Manipal Institute of Technology. I specialize in Data Analytics, Machine Learning, and Process Automation. I completed industry training at Vivartan Technologies and co-founded the CyberSpace cybersecurity club, conducting workshops for 1,000+ participants.

I work daily with Python, SQL, and Data Analytics tools like Tableau and Power BI. I'm skilled in RAG, LangChain, GenAI, ML Development, and Process Automation. I also have experience with Data Warehousing, AWS, HTML, and CSS.
Tell me about your RAG project

I implemented RAG to enhance a fine-tuned AI model, improving its accuracy on technical queries by 20%. I integrated multiple knowledge bases and developed a vector database knowledge base with retrieval system using text embeddings and chunking techniques.

I hold a B.Tech in Electronics and Communication with a minor in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision from Manipal Institute of Technology, Bengaluru (Oct 2021 - Aug 2025, 68%). I completed CBSE Science with 86.5% from Holy Cross School.
